name: They Come At Night (BudgieInWA, McFood)
description:
Your village is under attack! Not to worry, your affliction makes you a power fighter at night. Or so you have heard, you don't really remember...

Move with WASD or the arrow keys, bump into your friends to pick them up and place them down with E or Space or Enter. Set up your defences and prepare for a fight!

This game was made over 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 by Ben Ritter, James Haworth, McFood and Yan Liu. Sorry the level transition is broken :(
